question: Snowstorm appearance of knee joint with multiple loose bodies is seen in?
exp: ANSWER: (D) Synovial chondromatosis. REF: The Journal of bone and joint surgery: British volume: Volume 71, Pages 549-912, http:// www. springerlink. com/content/17m54n357304205m/Snowstorm knee: Seen in Synovial chondromatosis. Traumatic etiology. Joint effusion. Numerous brilliant white rice-grain size free bodies in arthroscopy (not radiographically)
